title: [Massive] Liver Surgery Training Scenario-Based Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical knowledge and basic anatomy understanding
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education utilizing medical simulation software and 3D models.

learning_goals: Learners can identify major blood vessels and bile duct locations with 80% accuracy by analyzing a 3D liver structure model.
Through scenario-based training, learners can develop hepatectomy plans and evaluate surgical risks in three or more categories.
Learners can rationally explain surgical decision-making processes with over 70% accuracy by analyzing actual surgical videos and reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
